thread.title: James Marshall

author: James Marshall
title: James Marshall
text: After receiving half of my delivery that I had paid for I emailed asking when it would arrive. It took 3 emails for them to say it is on order and will be with me shortly. 2 more weeks past and still no delivery I then emailed another 3 times asking for a refund as i no longer wanted this item. 2 more weeks pass and 2 more emails and finally got a refund. Not happy at all as it took me over a month to get this sorted.
